question: Track an order
llm_answer:
For purchases made directly from our website, you can track your order by clicking on this link: Track My Order
. Log in if you haven’t already, and follow the instructions. If your package is marked as “available for pickup,” it means it’s ready and waiting at your pickup point. If you can’t find your order, first check if you received a confirmation email. It may require manual processing and may not yet be confirmed. For any other questions, feel free to contact customer service.
For orders placed with our Marketplace sellers, you must wait for the seller to confirm your order. Once confirmed, you will receive an email informing you that your order is being prepared. You will then receive another email when your order is shipped. If you have questions or want to modify your order, you can use the “Have a question?” button in your order tracking. In case of cancellation, you will be notified by email and no charges will be made for the canceled item.

question: How to return a product
llm_answer:
For purchases made directly from our website, here are the return conditions:
Returning a small item: Returns are free for 30 days. Go to “Track My Orders,” select the order, click “Return an item,” and choose the item(s) to return. You can use Smart Return (QR code to present at a pickup point) or Standard Return (printable label).
Returning a large item: If the item doesn’t suit you, you can arrange a free home pickup by logging into your account, accessing your order tracking, and clicking “Return an item” to schedule the pickup.
For purchases from our Marketplace sellers, you have a fourteen (14) day withdrawal period from the date you receive the product. You don’t need to justify your decision or pay a penalty. To exercise this right, you must inform the seller clearly, for example via our website messaging. Click the “Have a question?” button in your order tracking, then specify your request by clicking “Contact the Seller.” You must also return the product to the address indicated by the seller within fourteen (14) days of your notification. Return costs are usually your responsibility unless otherwise stated by the seller. Products must be returned intact, unused, and with all accessories. Some items, like unsealed or customized products, cannot be returned.

question: Download an invoice
llm_answer:
To download your invoice, follow these steps:
Go to the site by clicking here: link
and log in to your customer account.
Select the relevant order.
If your order has been shipped for more than 5 days, you will see the “Download my invoice” option. Click it to get your invoice.
You can then save or print it.
Note: If your order was shipped by one of our partner sellers, you must contact them via your customer account by clicking “I have a question” to obtain your invoice.

question: Cancel an order
llm_answer:
For purchases made directly from our website, once the order is confirmed, it cannot be canceled. However, you can refuse delivery or return your order upon receipt to get a refund. If you have difficulty canceling your order, it is recommended to contact customer service, available Monday to Saturday from 8 am to 9 pm.
For orders from our Marketplace sellers, you have a fourteen (14) day withdrawal period from the date of receipt. To cancel your order, inform the seller clearly, for example via our website messaging. Ensure the product is intact, with all accessories, and return it to the address indicated by the seller within fourteen (14) days of notifying them. Return costs are usually your responsibility unless stated otherwise. If these conditions are met, the product price and standard shipping fees will be refunded within fourteen (14) days of your request.

question: Refund
llm_answer:
For purchases made directly from our website, you have 30 days from the date of receipt to return items you no longer wish to keep. Returned products must be intact and complete. Return shipping costs are your responsibility, except in the case of defective products. Once your return is received, the refund will be processed within 2 to 3 weeks.
For purchases from our Marketplace sellers, you have a fourteen (14) day withdrawal period from the date you receive the product. You can return the product without justification or penalty. To exercise this right, you must clearly inform the seller, e.g., via our website messaging. You must return the product to the address indicated by the seller within fourteen (14) days of notifying them. Return costs are usually your responsibility unless specified otherwise in the seller’s conditions. The refund will be made within fourteen (14) days, using the same payment method used for the purchase.

question: Can i use my visa card
llm_answer: I’m sorry, but Visa cards are not accepted for this service. Please try another payment method, such as Mastercard, American Express, or PayPal.
